thoughts.text: Now that I have cloned a travel repository from GitHub, I think I'll use the list_files command to list the files in the repository. This will allow me to see what information is available and where it is located.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the list_files command to list the files in the travel repository I cloned from GitHub will allow me to see what information is available and where it is located.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the list_files command to list the files in the travel repository I cloned from GitHub
- Browse through the files to find information on the top travel destinations mentioned in the Forbes article
- Read the information to learn more about the destinations and plan my travels more effectively
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am browsing through the correct files and that the information is reliable.
thoughts.speak: Now that I have cloned a travel repository from GitHub, I think I'll use the list_files command to list the files in the repository and see what information is available.
